languages.text: Нечестивые аугментации, внедренные в тело Паскаля, были беспощадно вырваны. Пусть тело пострадало, но дух и верность Омниссии укрепились и пребудут в чистоте.
The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure.
languages.original_text: Нечестивые аугментации, внедренные в тело Паскаля, были беспощадно вырваны. Пусть тело пострадало, но дух и верность Омниссии укрепились и пребудут в чистоте.

traits.locale_text: The unholy augments were mercilessly removed from the Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure.
The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from the Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure.

The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure.

languages.text: 穢れたオーグメティックは容赦なくパスカルの体から取り除かれた。彼の肉体は傷ついているかもしれないが、彼の精神と万機神への献身は強く純粋だ。
languages.original_text: The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure.

traits.locale_text: 穢れたオーグメティックは容赦なくパスカルの体から取り除かれた。彼の肉体は傷ついているかもしれないが、彼の精神と万機神への献身は強く純粋だ。

languages.text: 邪恶的植入物已经从帕斯卡的身体中被无情地移除。或许他的肉体确实受了伤，但他对欧姆尼塞亚的信念无比强大，无比纯洁。
languages.original_text: The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure.

traits.locale_text: 邪恶的植入物已经从帕斯卡的身体中被无情地移除。或许他的肉体确实受了伤，但他对欧姆尼塞亚的信念无比强大，无比纯洁。

languages.text: Los auméticos impíos fueron extirpados sin piedad del cuerpo de Pasqal. Su cuerpo puede estar dañado, pero su espíritu y su devoción al Omnissiah son fuertes y puros.
languages.original_text: The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure.

traits.locale_text: Los auméticos impíos fueron extirpados sin piedad del cuerpo de Pasqal. Su cuerpo puede estar dañado, pero su espíritu y su devoción al Omnissiah son fuertes y puros.

languages.text: Die unheiligen Augmentationen wurden gnadenlos aus Pasqals Körper entfernt. Sein Körper mag beschädigt sein, doch sein Geist und seine Hingabe dem Omnissiah gegenüber sind stark und rein.
languages.original_text: The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure.

traits.locale_text: Die unheiligen Augmentationen wurden gnadenlos aus Pasqals Körper entfernt. Sein Körper mag beschädigt sein, doch sein Geist und seine Hingabe dem Omnissiah gegenüber sind stark und rein.

languages.text: Les augmétiques impies ont été brutalement retirés du corps de Pasqal. Bien que son enveloppe soit endommagée, sa détermination et sa dévotion envers l'Omnimessie demeurent inébranlables.
languages.original_text: The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure.

traits.locale_text: Les augmétiques impies ont été brutalement retirés du corps de Pasqal. Bien que son enveloppe soit endommagée, sa détermination et sa dévotion envers l'Omnimessie demeurent inébranlables.

languages.text: Uğursuz ogmetikler, Pasqal'ın bedeninden acımasızca çıkarıldı. Bedeni hasar almış olsa da ruhu ve Hermesih'e olan bağlılığı güçlü ve saf durumda.
languages.original_text: The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure.

traits.locale_text: Uğursuz ogmetikler, Pasqal'ın bedeninden acımasızca çıkarıldı. Bedeni hasar almış olsa da ruhu ve Hermesih'e olan bağlılığı güçlü ve saf durumda.
